task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when the new record entry screen appears.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has content_desc "New .."

After touching the button with content description "New ..", a new screen appears that includes a text view labeled "New Account" and various input fields for entering account details, indicating the initiation of creating a new account.
